Class Patient

java.lang.Object
models.User
models.Patient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Patient extends User
Class representing a patient in the hospital management system. This class extends the User class and holds a patient's medical record.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String userID, String name, String password, String dateOfBirth, String gender, String bloodType, String email, String contactNo)
      Constructs a Patient object with the specified user details and initializes the medical record.
      Parameters:
      userID - The patient's ID.
      name - The patient's name.
      password - The patient's password.
      dateOfBirth - The patient's date of birth.
      gender - The patient's gender.
      bloodType - The patient's blood type.
      email - The patient's email address.
      contactNo - The patient's contact number.

  • Method Details

    • getMedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord getMedicalRecord()
      Gets the patient's medical record.
      Returns:
      The patient's medical record.

    • setMedicalRecord

      public void setMedicalRecord(String email, String contactNo)
      Sets or updates the patient's medical record with new contact information. If the medical record does not exist, a new one will be created.
      Parameters:
      email - The new email address of the patient.
      contactNo - The new contact number of the patient.
